    • About High Performance Real Estate Advisors


    High Performance Real Estate was built on the notion that the secret to achieving incredible goals and getting real results is to dominate real estate with a team approach. HPREA was built to combat the idea of a part-time real estate agent, because one part-time agent does not have the capacity to cover every aspect of the real estate process. Our team has sales, marketing, and operations professionals working to deliver a proven repeatable home selling process. This is the same process that they use to sell over 400 homes a year - that’s more than one house sold for every day of the year!

    Thomas Elrod and Lars Hedenborg
    High Performance Real Estate Advisors
    Keller Williams Realty
